author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

Contains several improvements to L1 track code:

1) Bit & clock-accurate emulation of Kalman filter track fit (to agree with firmware)
2) A new "combined" module for displaced L1 track reconstruction TrackletProcessorDisplaced.
3) The L1 tracking utility class Setup.h has been moved from L1Trigger/TrackerDTC/ to L1Trigger/TrackTrigger/ .

To work perfectly, this needs two PR to cms-data to be merged. (Though prompt L1 track reco will run OK without these).
i) https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-TrackTrigger/pull/2
ii) https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-TrackFindingTracklet/pull/5

#### PR validation:

The L1 tracking performance remains as expected. And CPU use is reduced.
title: L1 track bit accurate KF track fit emulation + other improvements
